net.threescale.api.v2

Interface HttpConnectionFactory


  • public interface HttpConnectionFactory
    Interface to obtain an HttpURLConnection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpURLConnection openConnection(String hostUrl)
      Open an http connection to the specified host.

    • Method Detail

      • openConnection

        HttpURLConnection openConnection(String hostUrl)
                                 throws IOException
        Open an http connection to the specified host.
        Parameters:
        hostUrl - Fully qualified URL to connect to e.g. http://su1.3scale.net
        Returns:
        An open HttpURLConnection.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the connection cannot be opend.
